title: Rujin Jiedu decoction protects against influenza virus infection by modulating gut microbiota

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Qilin Huang, Guizhen Yang, Chenchen Tang, Biao Dou, You Hu, Hui Liu, Xiao Wu, Huan Zhang, Haikun Wang, Lirong Xu, Xiao-Dong Yang, Yanwu Xu, Yuejuan Zheng
